DETROIT-- Chrysler reported a$ 199 million net loss for the fourth quarter of 2010, but excluding interest on its government loans and other restructuring debts, it earned a$ 198 million operating profit. What Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne said. "However, our job is not yet done. Jan. 23( Bloomberg)-- President Bush Secretary of State Colin Powell , a Republican who supported Democratic Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said he's not committed' to supporting Barack Obama or a specific Republican candidate in 2012. "I'm not committed to Barack Obama , I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell , a retired Army general who was chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, said on CNN's "State of the Union" program today.
